page.name: Horresnet (Staatliche Museum zur Aegyptischen Kunst, Munich)
page.creator: Kea Johnston

contents.p: This coffin belonged to a man named Horresnet, who served as a stolist priest of Min, Horus and Isis of Akhmim during his lifetime. His father, who held the same titles, was named Nesmin. His mother, who is also named, was a sistrum player of Min of Akhmim. Her name was Tasheritmehyt.

text.desc: Book of the Dead 33B, Accross the Breast of coffin.
text.al: Dd md.w in wsir Hr-rsn.t sA n(y)-s(w)-mnw ms(.t) nb(.t) pr iHy.t mnw [tA-Sri.t]-mHy.t Dd=f ib n mw.t(=i) sp-sn HAty n xpr(=i) m aHa r=i (m) mtr m xsf r=i m DADA.t m ir{.t} r=i m nTr.w m rqi r=i m-bAH iry mHA.t
text.tr: Recitation by the Osiris of Horresnet, son of Nesmin, who the lady of the house and sistrum-player of Min Tasheritmehyt bore. He says: Oh, my heart of my mother, my heart of my mother, my Haty-heart of my manifestation! Do not stand against me in testimony! Do not oppose me in the tribunal. Do not act against me with the gods. Do not defy me before the keeper of the scales!

frag.al: Dd md.w in As.t [Dd=z] mi ii n pr=k sp-sn iwn mi
frag.tr: Recitation by Isis. [She says:] Come to your home, come to your home, Oh Pillar! Come...

frag.al: ii n pr=k nn xfty.w=k ihy{.t} nfr mi ii n
frag.tr: ...to your home! There are no enemies of yours, oh beautiful sistrum-player. Come...

frag.al: mAA.t(w)=k ink sn(.t) mr(.t)=k nn Ab.t(w)=k r=i i
frag.tr: so that you might be seen! I am your beloved sister, and you will not be parted from me! Oh!

frag.al: Dd md.w in nb.t-Hw.t Dd=z [wn]n(=i) m sAH=k
frag.tr: Recitation by Nephthys. She says: [I exist] as your protection...

frag.al: wsir xn.ty imnt.t r<di>.n(=i) TAw r fnt(=k) n mHy.t
frag.tr: ...oh, Osiris, foremost of the west! I have given breath to your nostrils from the North Wind...

frag.al: pr m itm ink sn(.t) mr(.t)=k nn
frag.tr: ...which comes forth from Atum. I am your beloved sister, and...
...you will not be parted from me.
